timeline.bodyText: Linux builds have J9VM_OPT_JITSERVER defined. Isn't this essentially disabling the test for Linux?
timeline.author: mpirvu

replies.bodyText: It's disabling the test for Linux JITServer. NonJITServer on Linux still goes through with the test.
replies.author: harryyu1994

replies.bodyText: actually I know what you mean now. Yeah I think I need to use the isOutOfProcessCompilation() test instead.
replies.author: harryyu1994

Override cpu asserts on Z

The intention is to disable cpu assertion tests
for JITServer.

Signed-off-by: Harry Yu <harryyu1994@gmail.com>

Disable cpu asserts for JITServer

Disabled the cpu related asserts for JITServer.
These asserts are meant to only test the correctness of new APIs
against old APIs for a single host processor and they fall apart
when we introduce remote target processors into the picture.

Signed-off-by: Harry Yu <harryyu1994@gmail.com>
